name: tachibot-mcp
description: Multi-model AI orchestration platform with 26 tools across Perplexity, Grok, OpenAI GPT-5, Gemini, and Qwen

TACHIBOT_PROFILE.title: Tool Profile
TACHIBOT_PROFILE.description: Select tool profile: minimal, research_power, code_focus, balanced (default), or full

PERPLEXITY_API_KEY.title: Perplexity API Key
PERPLEXITY_API_KEY.description: For web search, research, and reasoning (Get from perplexity.ai)

GROK_API_KEY.title: Grok API Key
GROK_API_KEY.description: For code analysis, debugging, and architecture (Get from x.ai)

OPENAI_API_KEY.title: OpenAI API Key
OPENAI_API_KEY.description: For GPT-5, Qwen, and QwQ models (Get from platform.openai.com)

GOOGLE_API_KEY.title: Google Gemini API Key
GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: For Gemini brainstorming and analysis (Get from makersuite.google.com)

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.title: OpenRouter API Key (Optional)
OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: Alternative provider for additional models (Get from openrouter.ai)

TACHI_ENABLE_CACHE.title: Enable Result Caching
TACHI_ENABLE_CACHE.description: Cache API responses to reduce costs
